summary: Comprehensive testing of GoMcaddy food delivery platform completed. Backend APIs working 100% (15/15 tests passed). Frontend UI functional with one critical cart bug identified. All authentication, restaurant browsing, menu display, and protected routes working correctly.

integration_issues.issue: Add to cart functionality broken - cart count updates but items array remains empty
integration_issues.details: Cart count badge shows correct number but cart page shows empty. Local storage shows empty items array despite successful add operations. Cart state management issue in CartContext.

passed_tests: Backend: All 15 API endpoints (auth, restaurants, orders, payments, reviews)
Frontend: Homepage loading and hero section
Frontend: Restaurant detail pages and menu display
Frontend: User menu and authentication state
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix critical cart functionality bug in CartContext (/app/frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.js). The addToCart function appears to update cart count but not the items array. Investigate state synchronization issue between cart count and items array. All other features working correctly.
